DEFAULT.question: What are the charges for gold?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
The live price is quoted on the basis of wholesale prices in the spot market.

It has certain margins added to it to provide for payment gateway charges, storage, insurance, trustee and custodian charges.

The gold rate excludes taxes, making charges, and delivery charges. 3% GST is applicable while buying gold.

DEFAULT.question: What are the taxes involved in gold?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
The gold rates shown on Groww at the time of purchasing/selling is exclusive of taxes.

However, tax on income from sale of gold is applicable.

DEFAULT.question: My issue is not listed here.
DEFAULT.answer: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!
